text: @melindagates @WHO #alcoholawareness Yes Melinda-Listen to science,WHO and Global health partners-Any Alcohol is science based proven carcinogen-Avoid Alcohol consumption,including with #COVID19-Show your support. and 'Retweet to spread the word!
